name: Copernicus Group IRB
overview:
Copernicus Group IRB is an independent institutional review board, ensuring the rights and welfare of research study participants. CGIRB provides ethical review of research protocols, investigator/subject information and consent forms to ensure compliance with federal regulations set forth in 21 CFR, 45 CFR and ICH/GCP Guidelines. CGIRB achieved full AAHRPP accreditation in 2004 and ISO 9001:2008 certification in 2010.
